synopsis.text: Will Masuo Fuguno, a 24-year-old school teacher with no romantic experience, finally find love? Despite a fortune teller's prediction that he will never find true love, Masuo is determined to change his fate. He meets Nagisa Shiozaki, a beautiful kindergarten teacher, at a matchmaking event and becomes smitten with her. However, his co-worker Miho has also fallen for him, creating a complicated love triangle. As Masuo tries to navigate this delicate situation, he finds himself in constant trouble due to his clumsiness and misunderstandings with Nagisa. Will Masuo find the courage to choose between the two women and finally experience love, or will his indecisiveness and mishaps cost him his chance at happiness?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
